events.message: The policyholder reported a car accident involving a rear-end collision on the highway during rush hour.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after review of initial details and police report references.
An experienced auto claims agent was assigned to handle the accident claim for prompt processing.
The claimant was promptly contacted to acknowledge receipt of the claim and outline next steps.
Request sent for police report, photographs of vehicle damage, and repair estimates to verify details.
The claimant submitted all requested documents including the police report and detailed photos of damage.
Investigation began to verify claim facts, check vehicle damage, and confirm liability based on evidence.
Investigation confirmed claimant liability was not at fault and damage estimate matched submitted documents.
A settlement offer was proposed covering full repair costs as estimated by the approved auto body shop.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the timely processing and clear communication from the agent.
The claim was officially approved to move forward with payment to repair service based on agreement.
Payment for vehicle repairs was authorized and issued directly to the repair shop for speedy service.
The claim was closed after confirmation that repairs were completed satisfactorily and payment settled.
All claim documentation and records were archived following closure for future reference and auditing.
